humanum_full_description_en:
From " food " to " ji " sound. The original meaning is not harvesting grains, famine years. "Shuowen": "Hungry, the valley is not hungry. From food, a few sounds." Such as "The Analects. "Yan Yuan": "Ai Gong asked Yu Youruo: "You are hungry in the year, if you don't use it, how can it be?"" Huang Kanyishu: "Wait is hungry." "Zuo Zhuan. "Fifteen Years of Xi Gong": "Jin hunger, Qin lost the millet; Qin hunger, Jin was closed, so Qin uncle expelled Jin."

" Hungry " can pass " hungry " to indicate hunger. Such as "Han Feizi. "Safety": "Therefore, the law to keep the country safe is to eat if you are hungry, and if you are clothed in cold, it is natural if you do not order." "Dangbing": "Soldiers are sincere and righteous. They punish the tyrants to vindicate the people. The people say it, if the filial son sees kindness, if the hungry sees good food.
humanum_short_description_en: From " food " to " ji " sound. The original meaning is not harvesting grains, famine years.
humanum_full_description:
從「食」，「幾」聲。本義是五穀不收、荒年。《說文》：「饑，穀不孰爲饑。从食，幾聲。」如《論語．顏淵》：「哀公問於有若曰：『年饑，用不足，如之何？』」皇侃義疏：「乏穀為饑。」《左傳．僖公十五年》：「晉饑，秦輸之粟；秦饑，晉閉之糴，故秦伯伐晉。」

　　「饑」可通「飢」，表示飢餓。如《韓非子．安危》：「故安國之法，若饑而食，寒而衣，不令而自然也。」《呂氏春秋．蕩兵》：「兵誠義，以誅暴君而振苦民，民之說之也，若孝子之見慈親也，若饑者之見美食也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「食」，「幾」聲。本義是五穀不收、荒年。

Hanzi: 饥

從「 食 」，「 幾 」聲。本義是五穀不收、荒年。《說文》：「饑，穀不孰爲饑。从食，幾聲。」如《論語．顏淵》：「哀公問於有若曰：『年饑，用不足，如之何？』」皇侃義疏：「乏穀為饑。」《左傳．僖公十五年》：「晉饑，秦輸之粟；秦饑，晉閉之糴，故秦伯伐晉。」 「 饑 」可通「 飢 」，表示飢餓。如《韓非子．安危》：「故安國之法，若饑而食，寒而衣，不令而自然也。」《呂氏春秋．蕩兵》：「兵誠義，以誅暴君而振苦民，民之說之也，若孝子之見慈親也，若饑者之見美食也。」
From " food" to " ji" sound. The original meaning is not harvesting grains, famine years. "Shuowen": "Hungry, the valley is not hungry. From food, a few sounds." Such as "The Analects. "Yan Yuan": "Ai Gong asked Yu Youruo: "You are hungry in the year, if you don't use it, how can it be?"" Huang Kanyishu: "Wait is hungry." "Zuo Zhuan. "Fifteen Years of Xi Gong": "Jin hunger, Qin lost the millet; Qin hunger, Jin was closed, so Qin uncle expelled Jin." " Hungry" can pass " hungry" to indicate hunger. Such as "Han Feizi. "Safety": "Therefore, the law to keep the country safe is to eat if you are hungry, and if you are clothed in cold, it is natural if you do not order." "Dangbing": "Soldiers are sincere and righteous. They punish the tyrants to vindicate the people. The people say it, if the filial son sees kindness, if the hungry sees good food.

饑字的基本解释

饑
jī
见“饥”②。

饑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》居依切，平微，見。］
“饥1”的繁体字。
(1)年成很差或颗粒无收。
(2)通“飢”。肚子吃不饱；飢饿。
(3)姓。殷之後有饥氏。见《左传·定公四年》。

饑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　饑； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1425第35
〔古文〕??【玉篇】紀衣切，音機。【說文】穀不熟爲饑。从食幾聲。餘詳飢字註。

饑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
饑字的起名意思

暂无。

hungry
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" Ju Yiqie, Ping Wei, see. ]
Traditional characters for "Hang 1".
(1) Poor maturity or no harvest of pellets.
(2) Through "hunger". The stomach is not full; hungry.
(3) Last name. There is Hungry after Yin. See "Zuo Zhuan·Ding Gong Four Years".
hungry

[Xu Ji 2] [Food Character Department] 　hun; Kangxi strokes: 21; page number: page 1425 to 35
[Ancient text]?? [Jade articles] Ji Yiqi, sound machine. [Speaking of text] Gu is not familiar with hunger. A few sounds from the food. Yu Xiangxian word note.
